name: Maria Khan
hobbies: Quality time with people I care about
education: University of New Hampshire - Full stack web development professional certificate
occupation: Full stack web developer, Front-end developer, Software engineer
beliefs: I believe in trying to make this world a better place one good deed at a time and strive to be a good person.
dreamProjects: To create many apps in my lifetime as a developer that will change lives in a positive direction for people. I want to make a difference.
techCommunities: Next.js discord, AWS Amplify discord, Three.js games discord, ChatGPT community on discord.
topSkills: Excellent team player honed through 15 years of collaborative work experience.
Ability to think outside the box as an engineer.
favoriteQuote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it. - Alan Kay

technologies.name: React
technologies.whyIloveThem: React feels like home. Its component-driven approach and vibrant community make building complex user interfaces intuitive and enjoyable.

technologies.name: Next.js
technologies.whyIloveThem: Next.js is my secret weapon for building performant, SEO-friendly web apps. Its hybrid rendering capabilities offer the flexibility I need to deliver exceptional user experiences.

technologies.name: AWS Services
technologies.whyIloveThem: I'm drawn to the power and scalability of AWS services. Their wide range of tools allows me to build, deploy, and manage robust web solutions.

technologies.name: Anything AI-related
technologies.whyIloveThem: AI has the potential to transform web development as we know it. I'm eager to explore how AI can be used to create more personalized, intelligent, and accessible online experiences.

technologies.name: Front-end development
technologies.whyIloveThem: While I'm a capable full-stack developer, my passion lies in crafting beautiful and intuitive front-end interfaces. I believe the user experience is paramount.
